description:
Rochelle owns a number of Donpan and she trains then to sniff out amberite so she can sell it so that it can eventually be turned into jewellery.
Team Rocket steals Rochelle`s young Donphan in hope that it could help track down some amberite so that they could make money from it.
Rochelle`s Donphan aided her in locating and rescuing the young Donphan along with Ash Ketchum.
Once the Donphan was recovered Rochelle has Pokemon battle with Ash Ketchum where she defeats Ash`s Heracross using one of her Donphan.
name: Donfan (Hiiragi)
